issue.title: [Python] pyarrow deserialize return datetime.datetime
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9755](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9755). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With latest pyarrow 1.0, pyarrow deserialize return datetime.datetime. Was fine with 0.17.1

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9755?focusedCommentId=17178770) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Can you show a code example that reproduces your issue? Also, what did it return in 0.17.1?
